snippet.title: What's new in the Equilibrious Test? Join the recruitment! | Perfect New World
snippet.description:
Check out the #PerfectNewWorld latest Equilibrious Test trailer to see the new features! Enjoy the combat of the new class Dragonspear, explore the new locales and dungeons, and don't miss the chance to defeat others in new #BattleRoyale gameplay.
Get the eligibility on the official website: https://pnw.perfectworld.com

0:00 NEW WORLD
0:28 NEW CLASS
0:42 NEW LOCALES
0:54 NEW GAMEPLAY-MOUNT SYSTEM
1:05 NEW DUNGEONS
1:20 NEW GAMEPLAY-BATTLE ROYALE
1:42 NEW BOSSES

👇 Follow us to know more about Perfect New World 
Discord: https://discord.gg/perfectnewworld
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PerfectNewWorld 

#PerfectNewWorld #PConline
